title: Teach me how I can do it myself: the Montessori Method in the Netherlands (TEFC)
creator_credit: Nederlandse Onderwijs Film, Jack Apon and Theo Van Haren Noman
brief_description: Dr. Maria Montessori’s original contribution to the psychology of education has left a mark on present day schooling throughout the world. This film aims to give an impression of the methods she worked out for infant and primary school, based upon the child’s genuine needs.
